mapper.insert: insert into comment_task (id, content, files, created_date, task_id, user_id, parent_id, title) value(#{id}, #{content}, #{files}, NOW(), #{task.id}, #{user.id}, #{parentComment.id}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS comment_id, c.title AS comment_title, c.content AS comment_content, c.files AS comment_files, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.parent_id AS comment_parent_id, c.modified_date AS comment_modified_date, c.modified_by AS comment_modified_by, u.fullname AS user_fullname, u.avatar AS user_avatar FROM comment_task c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id OR c.parent_id IS NOT NULL WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment_task SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, files = #{files}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, modified_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS comment_id, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.title AS comment_title, c.content AS comment_content, c.files AS comment_files, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.parent_id AS comment_parent_id, c.modified_date AS comment_modified_date, c.modified_by AS comment_modified_by, u.fullname AS user_fullname, u.avatar AS user_avatar FROM comment_task c INNER JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.parent_id = #{id}
